sen.j: 名神高速道路国道1号国道171号京滋バイパス
sen.e: Meishin Expressway, National Highway Route No. 1, National Highway Route No. 171, Keiji Bypass
Meishin Expressway, National Highway Route No. 1, National Highway Route No. 171, Keiji Bypass
Meishin Expressway, National Highway Route No. 1, National Highway Route No. 171, Keiji Bypass

sen.j: 国道478号（こくどう478ごう）は、京都府宮津市から京都府久世郡久御山町へ至る一般国道である。
sen.e: The National Highway Route 478 is a general national highway extending from Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture to Kumiyama Town Kuse-gun, Kyoto Prefecture.
National Highway Route 478 is a general national highway extending from Miyazu City in Kyoto Prefecture to Kumiyama Town Kuse-gun in Kyoto Prefecture.
National Highway Route No. 478 is a general national highway that extends from Miyazu City in Kyoto Prefecture to Kumiyama Town Kuse-gun in Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 乙訓郡大山崎町の国道171号から久世郡久御山町の国道1号交点までは一般道路も建設されているが、大部分は京都縦貫自動車道として建設される。
sen.e: The road, for the most part, is constructed as the Kyoto Jukan Jidoshado Highway., although a general road is being constructed between the section from the intersection with the National Highway Route No, 171 at Yamazaki-cho Otokumi-gun to the intersection with the National Highway Route No. 1 at Kumiyama Town Kuse-gun.

The road is generally constructed as the Kyoto Jukan Jidoshado Highway, although a general road is being constructed between the section from the intersection with National Highway Route No, 171 at Yamazaki-cho in Otokumi-gun, to the intersection with National Highway Route No. 1 at Kumiyama Town in Kuse-gun.

The road is generally constructed as the Kyoto Jukan Jidoshado Highway, although a general road is being constructed between the portion from the intersection with National Highway Route No. 171 at Oyamazaki-cho in Otokuni-gun, to the intersection with National Highway Route No. 1 at Kumiyama Town in Kuse-gun.

sen.j: 現在は京都縦貫道丹波インター～近畿自動車道舞鶴若狭線綾部安国寺インター間(丹波綾部道路)が国土交通省の手によって建設されている。
sen.e: The section (Tanba Ayabe Road) from Tanba Interchange of the Kyoto Jukan Jidoshado Highway to Ankokuji Interchange of the Kinki Jidoshado Highway Maizuru Wakasa Line is being constructed by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism
sen.cmt: www.kkr.mlit.go.jp/http://www.wdic.org/w/GEO/近畿自動車道%20(高速道)http://www.wdic.org/w/GEO/丹波綾部道路http://www.mlit.go.jp/index.htmlhttp://www.mlit.go.jp/index.html
sen.e: The section called Tanba Ayabe Road, which will run from the Tanba Interchange of the Kyoto Jukan Jidoshado Highway to the Ankokuji Interchange of the Kinki Jidoshado Highway Maizuru Wakasa Line, is being constructed by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism.

The section called Tanba Ayabe Road, which will run from the Tanba Interchange of the Kyoto Jukan Jidoshado Highway to the Ankokuji Interchange of the Kinki Jidoshado Highway Maizuru Wakasa Line, is being constructed by the Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism.

sen.j: 起点：京都府宮津市（宮津天橋立インターチェンジ＝国道312号鳥取豊岡宮津自動車道終点）

sen.j: 終点：京都府久世郡久御山町（＝国道1号交点）
sen.e: Terminus: Kumiyama Town, Kuse-gun, Kyoto Prefecture (= the intersection with National Highway Route No. 1)

sen.j: 主な経由地：舞鶴市、綾部市、亀岡市、京都市、八幡市
